https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rGRvBEZ9j70RcEmDTNHxskTiDS1.jpg Ana, a nine year old girl, arrives with her mother to an isolated beach with the intention to rest and to know the sea. There, she discovers that they are under a terrible threat, therefore she is obligated to look for help with her father in order to save her mother. Ana & Bruno
